item.title: Chance the Rapper Breaks Down His Six-Year Journey to New Album ‘Star Line’
item.description: The three-time Grammy-winning artist speaks with The Hollywood Reporter about his multi-year “residency” that led to ‘Star Line,’ his unique creative process and his perfectly timed partnership with A
